channel.title: Burden of Guilt on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics
channel.description: Recent content in Burden of Guilt on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: Burden of Guilt: Ep 4 - The Body Keeps the Score | Burden of Guilt
item.description: Podcast Description With Jan Barry Sandlin’s murder trial approaching, Prosecutors unearth new evidence that changes their entire understanding of the case. As the trial begins, Tracyraquel confronts one of her toughest challenges yet; coming face to face with Jan Barry Sandlin in the courtroom. This is the first time Tracyraquel has been in the same room with her father since she was a little girl. The trial and the long road to justice for baby Matthew begins.

item.title: Burden of Guilt: Ep 3 - Ashes to Ashes | Burden of Guilt
item.description: Podcast Description With Jan’s upcoming parole hearing, Tracyraquel was in a race against time to keep her father behind bars. So Tracyraquel pressed her mother for any information that would keep him in prison. After a fateful phone call, her mother’s admission about the day Matthew died was shocking. But it also led investigators to do something nobody could imagine 27 years later. If you would like to reach out to the Burden of Guilt Team, email us at burdenofguiltpod@gmail.

item.title: Burden of Guilt: Ep 2 - Physics | Burden of Guilt
item.description: Podcast Description Tracyraquel was always unsure how her baby brother died. When she finally got access to the official medical report, it felt suspicious and incomplete. But the more questions she asked, the more people dismissed her...except for one person. His shocking revelation and a simple lesson in physics pushed Tracyraquel to get law enforcement involved. Together, they’d go to war to expose the truth. If you would like to reach out to the Burden of Guilt Team, email us at burdenofguiltpod@gmail.

item.title: Burden of Guilt: Ep 1 - Age of Innocence | Burden of Guilt
item.description: Podcast Description The loss of her baby brother has haunted Tracyraquel Berns ever since she was 2 years old. Growing up, her questions about her brother’s death were met with beatings from her father. As an adult, Tracyraquel did her own investigation and what she discovered would change everything. It caused a burden that she would carry with her for the rest of her life. That burden of guilt coupled with a nagging suspicion that there was more to the story, led Tracyraquel to revisit her abusive and dysfunctional childhood in a quest for the whole truth.

item.title: Introducing: Burden of Guilt | Burden of Guilt
item.description: Podcast Description Burden of Guilt is an emotionally harrowing audio docu-series that tells the story of Tracyraquel Berns, a woman who has spent four decades at the center of one of the most bizarre and disturbing criminal cases in American History – surrounding the devastating and mysterious death of her baby brother. This podcast explores Tracyraquel’s pursuit for justice and her journey to confront the burden of guilt she has carried with her for the majority of her life.
